Simon Cowell writes I look upon it[ groveling] as a sign of desperation. So many times people come in and they come up with this terrible dialogue about how much they like me or Randy or Paula. It's demeaning, and there's no point to it. We're not looking for a nice person; we're looking for somebody who's confident and assured, but talented above all. Trust me-- most stars aren't nice. 2. Howard Stern made a shocking allegation while appearing on the Late Show with David Letterman . Howard Stern told David Letterman and the Late Show viewers that Regis Philbin didn't really retire, he was fired. He got fired. He went in and he asked for more money and they gave poor old Regis Philbin the boot, said Howard Stern .`` I don't want to hear that. I don't want to believe that,'' said David Letterman . Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.
